divs: sighting detailsat 8:30pm i went outside to watch the meteor shower that i read about that was suppose to happen. i was sitting on my front porch looking at the night sky,and i noticed three very bright stars. or what i thought were stars. i could not help but star at the brightest one. it was south west of my porch. it started out high above the tree line in my front yard and then moved lower. and then it was moving. i called my daughter to get my husband from the garage and look at this. he said it looked like a bright star is all. or maybe a helicopter or plane or something he looked at it for a second then went on with his project in the garage. i watched as it got lower. and then it started moving , like bouncing. up and down in a very fast rythm. as it got lower about 1 mile above the trees, two other "stars" appeared by it. my daughter got our spotlight for me and i pointed it at the light. i felt like this wanted something. like for me to notice it or something. i know this sounds crazy but it was like it was talking to me, and i asked it to come closer it got brighter... how weird is that... the color was a bright yellow then a red and a bluish orange color. it was bright then it was not so bright i could see, when the light was dimmest, the shape, like a disk or circle with a ring above it or something. the brightest one was bouncing and moving from left to right and up and down, just bouncing. it was truely amazing. then i noticed my neighbors across the road had gotten out into the street and started walking in the direction of the light. it then started to slowly bounce and move to the west. i got in my car and tried to follow it. as i got to the end of the gravel road about 1\2 mile, it slowly moved away, it was probably 5 or 6 miles to the west of me as i sat there in my car and watched it, then as fast as a blink it raced straight up. and it was gone. i am convinced something was there and i will search for it again tonight. if i see it i will be back to share this with you all. i took one picture with my cannon when it was starting to leave it looks like a bright light in the sky. i forgot to mention there was a helicopter that came over my house during this time ... it was flying high but it went directly over my house.. also as the circle was leaving i could see air planes going behind it they were farther off from it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Whitesboro
This sighting has never been favorited.
